dv_downloadmenu_1, dv_vorlage_list_1, databaseMigrationRS_rest_1, HttpVersionInterceptor_1, dv_version_1, dv_skiplinks_1) {
    "use strict";
    Object.defineProperty(exports, "__esModule", { value: true });
    var dynamicDependencies = function () {
        var dynDep = [];
        //hier kommen plugins die wir fuer dev disablen wollen
        if (ENV === 'development') {
            return [];
        }
        return dynDep;
    };
    var dependencies = [
        /* Angular modules */
        'ngAnimate',
        'ngSanitize',
        'ngMessages',
        'ngAria',
        'ngCookies',
        /* shared DVBern modules */
        router_module_1.default.name,
        errors_1.EbeguErrors.name,
        authentication_module_1.EbeguAuthentication.name,
        /* 3rd-party modules */
        'ui.bootstrap',
        'smart-table',
        'ngMaterial',
        'ngMessages',
        'pascalprecht.translate',
        'angularMoment',
        'cfp.hotkeys',
        'ngFileUpload',
        'unsavedChanges'
    ];
    exports.EbeguWebCore = angular
        .module('ebeguWeb.core', dependencies.concat(dynamicDependencies()))
        .run(core_route_1.appRun)
        .config(config_1.configure)
        .constant('REST_API', '/ebegu/api/v1/')
        .constant('MAX_LENGTH', 255)
        .constant('CONSTANTS', {
        name: 'EBEGU',
        REST_API: '/ebegu/api/v1/',
        MAX_LENGTH: 255,
        FALLNUMMER_LENGTH: 6,
        PATTERN_BETRAG: '([0-9]{0,12})',
        PATTERN_PERCENTAGE: '^[0-9][0-9]?$|^100$',
        PATTERN_PHONE: '(0|\\+41|0041)\\s?([\\d]{2})\\s?([\\d]{3})\\s?([\\d]{2})\\s?([\\d]{2})',
        PATTERN_MOBILE: '(0|\\+41|0041)\\s?(74|75|76|77|78|79)\\s?([\\d]{3})\\s?([\\d]{2})\\s?([\\d]{2})',
        PATTERN_EMAIL: '[^\\s@]+@[^\\s@]+\\.[^\\s@]{2,}',
        INSTITUTIONSSTAMMDATENID_DUMMY_TAGESSCHULE: '199ac4a1-448f-4d4c-b3a6-5aee21f89613'
    })
        .service('EbeguRestUtil', EbeguRestUtil_1.default)
        .service('EbeguUtil', EbeguUtil_1.default)
        .service('GesuchstellerRS', gesuchstellerRS_rest_1.default)
        .service('AdresseRS', adresseRS_rest_1.default)
        .service('ListResourceRS', listResourceRS_rest_1.default)
        .service('FallRS', fallRS_rest_1.default)
        .service('FamiliensituationRS', familiensituationRS_rest_1.default)
        .service('GesuchModelManager', gesuchModelManager_1.default)

        .service('FinanzielleSituationRS', finanzielleSituationRS_rest_1.default)
        .service('EinkommensverschlechterungContainerRS', einkommensverschlechterungContainerRS_rest_1.default)
        .service('EinkommensverschlechterungInfoRS', einkommensverschlechterungInfoRS_rest_1.default)
        .service('MandantRS', mandantRS_rest_1.MandantRS)
        .service('TraegerschaftRS', traegerschaftRS_rest_1.TraegerschaftRS)
        .service('InstitutionRS', institutionRS_rest_1.InstitutionRS)
        .service('InstitutionStammdatenRS', institutionStammdatenRS_rest_1.InstitutionStammdatenRS)
        .service('ErwerbspensumRS', erwerbspensumRS_rest_1.default)
        .service('KindRS', kindRS_rest_1.default)
        .service('DvDialog', dv_dialog_1.DvDialog)
        .service('BetreuungRS', betreuungRS_rest_1.default)
        .service('GesuchsperiodeRS', gesuchsperiodeRS_rest_1.default)
        .service('UserRS', userRS_rest_1.default)
        .service('VerfuegungRS', verfuegungRS_rest_1.default)
        .service('DokumenteRS', dokumenteRS_rest_1.default)
        .service('UploadRS', uploadRS_rest_1.UploadRS)
        .service('DownloadRS', downloadRS_rest_1.DownloadRS)
        .service('WizardStepRS', WizardStepRS_rest_1.default)
        .service('AntragStatusHistoryRS', antragStatusHistoryRS_rest_1.default)
        .service('MitteilungRS', mitteilungRS_rest_1.default)
        .service('ZahlungRS', zahlungRS_rest_1.default)
        .service('GlobalCacheService', globalCacheService_1.default)
        .service('ExportRS', exportRS_rest_1.default)
        .directive('dvMaxLength', dv_max_length_1.default.factory())
        .directive('dvDatepicker', dv_datepicker_1.DVDatepicker.factory())
        .directive('dvValueinput', dv_valueinput_1.DVValueinput.factory())
        .directive('dvUserselect', dv_userselect_1.DVUserselect.factory())
        .directive('dvNavigation', dv_navigation_1.DVNavigation.factory())
        .directive('dvLoading', dv_loading_1.DVLoading.factory())
        .directive('dvLoadingButton', dv_loading_button_1.DVLoadingButton.factory())
        .directive('dvSubmitevent', dv_submitevent_1.default.factory())
        .directive('dvStPersistAntraege', dv_st_persist_antraege_1.default.factory())
        .directive('dvStPersistPendenzen', dv_st_persist_pendenzen_1.default.factory())
        .directive('dvStResetSearch', dv_st_reset_search_1.default.factory())
        .directive('dvShowElement', dv_show_element_1.DVShowElement.factory())
        .directive('dvDisplayElement', dv_display_element_1.DVDisplayElement.factory())
        .directive('dvEnableElement', dv_enable_element_1.DVEnableElement.factory())
        .directive('dvBarcodeListener', dv_barcode_listener_1.DVBarcodeListener.factory())
        .directive('dvTrimEmpty', dv_trim_empty_1.default.factory())
        .directive('dvSuppressFormSubmitOnEnter', dv_suppress_form_submit_on_enter_1.default.factory())
        .service('FachstelleRS', fachstelleRS_rest_1.FachstelleRS)
        .service('BerechnungsManager', berechnungsManager_1.default)
        .service('HttpResponseInterceptor', HttpResponseInterceptor_1.default)
        .service('HttpVersionInterceptor', HttpVersionInterceptor_1.default)
        .service('WizardStepManager', wizardStepManager_1.default)
        .service('NavigationLogger', NavigationLogger_1.NavigationLogger)
        .service('SearchIndexRS', searchIndexRS_rest_1.SearchIndexRS)
        .service('DVsTPersistService', dVsTPersistService_1.DVsTPersistService)
        .controller('DVElementController', DVRoleElementController_1.DVRoleElementController)
        .component('dvAdresse', new dv_adresse_1.AdresseComponentConfig())
        .component('dvErrorMessages', new dv_error_messages_1.DvErrorMessagesComponentConfig())
        .component('dvErwerbspensumList', new dv_erwerbspensum_list_1.DVErwerbspensumListConfig())
        .component('dvInputContainer', new dv_input_container_1.DvInputContainerComponentConfig())
        .component('dvRadioContainer', new dv_radio_container_1.DvRadioContainerComponentConfig())
        .component('dvTooltip', new dv_tooltip_1.DvTooltipComponentConfig())
        .component('dvPulldownUserMenu', new dv_pulldown_user_menu_1.DvPulldownUserMenuComponentConfig())
        .component('dvMobileNavigationToggle', new dv_mobile_navigation_toggle_1.DvMobileNavigationToggleComponentConfig())
        .component('dvHomeIcon', new dv_home_icon_1.DvHomeIconComponentConfig())
        .component('dvSkiplinks', new dv_skiplinks_1.DvSkiplinksComponentConfig())
        .component('dvDownloadmenu', new dv_downloadmenu_1.DvDownloadmenuComponentConfig())
        .component('dvCountdown', new dv_countdown_1.DvCountdownComponentConfig())
        .component('dvPosteingang', new dv_posteingang_1.DvPosteingangComponentConfig())
        .component('dvBisher', new dv_bisher_1.DvBisherComponentConfig())
        .component('dvDokumenteList', new dv_dokumente_list_1.DVDokumenteListConfig())
        .component('dvAntragList', new dv_antrag_list_1.DVAntragListConfig())
        .component('dvVorlageList', new dv_vorlage_list_1.DVVorlageListConfig())
        .component('dvPendenzenList', new dv_pendenzen_list_1.DVPendenzenListConfig())
        .component('dvQuicksearchbox', new dv_quicksearchbox_1.DvQuicksearchboxComponentConfig())
        .component('dvSearchResultIcon', new dv_search_result_icon_1.DvSearchResultIconComponentConfig())
        .component('dvMitteilungList', new dv_mitteilung_list_1.DVMitteilungListConfig())
        .component('dvAccordion', new dv_accordion_1.DvAccordionComponentConfig())
        .component('dvAccordionTab', new dv_accordion_tab_1.DvAccordionTabComponentConfig())
        .component('dvVersion', new dv_version_1.DVVersionComponentConfig())
        .service('MahnungRS', mahnungRS_rest_1.default)
        .service('ReportRS', reportRS_rest_1.ReportRS)
        .service('EwkRS', ewkRS_rest_1.default)
        .service('DatabaseMigrationRS', databaseMigrationRS_rest_1.DatabaseMigrationRS)
        .filter('arrayToString', function () {
        return function (input) {
            if (input) {
                return input.join(', ');
            }
            return '';
        };
    });
});
